content:
Sure, here are some antifungal sprays or powders that can help prevent or treat nail fungus:

1. Lamisil AT Antifungal Spray: This spray includes terbinafine hydrochloride, which eliminates 99% of the fungus that causes athlete's foot and toenail fungus.

2. Lotrimin AF Athlete's Foot Powder: This powder contains clotrimazole, which fights against the fungus that causes athlete's foot and jock itch.

3. Zeasorb Super Absorbent Antifungal Treatment Powder: This powder helps to eliminate sweat, itching, and burning associated with fungal infections of the skin. It contains miconazole nitrate, which kills fungi that cause skin infections.

4. Tinactin Antifungal Powder Spray: This spray includes tolnaftate to prevent and treat athlete's foot and jock itch.

Always follow the instructions carefully when using antifungal sprays or powders. If your symptoms worsen or do not improve after using these products, consult a doctor.
